body.name: 3 Pack Screen Protector for iPhone 12 / iPhone 12 Pro Tempered Glass, 6.1 Inch 9H Full Screen Glass Protection, Case Friendly, Anti-Scratch, Bubble Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 49 mins
features: 🌞▶Compatibility◀ The 3 Pack Tempered Glass Screen Protector only compatible with Apple iPhone 12 and 12 Pro 2020, 6.1 inch. Not for any other models.

🌞▶Anti-Scratch / Oil / Fingerprint◀ Glass screen protector iPhone 12 /12 Pro will perfect fit your phone, Precise laser cutting size provides maximum protection for the surface of your iPhone 12/12 Pro, keeps your screen scratched by any keys, coins, and even knives in your pocket.
🌞▶BUBBLE-FREE◀ The tempered glass screen protector for iPhone 12/12 Pro will self-expel air bubble when automatically bonding with the screen.

🌞▶Crystal Clear & Sensitive Touch◀ 99.99% optical-grade light transparency, effectively blocking and filtering ultraviolet rays, prevent glare, fully reduce eye fatigue, ultra-clear glass ensures a flawless viewing experience and Face ID compatibility. 3D smooth touch, restore original sensitive feeling.

🌞▶Case-friendly Design◀ Full screen coverage protection (except edges). The screen protector leaves enough space for the case to protect your phone, Maximum coverage of your mobile without interfering with the phone case.

reviews.reviewText: Love the cleaning tools that came with it and it’s really easy to put on. It seems like it doesn’t fit my IPhone 15 as well as it could. However, the product does its job and came with extras which is great for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far soo good
reviews.reviewText: I try not to drop my phone since my last, so although i cant say the durability is good bc idk, its crystal clear, everything is perfect if u cant install it good, mine was barely noticeably off but either way the price was worth the purchase for 3 protectors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars solid protection for your device's screen at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: The AVOAR 3 Pack Screen Protector for iPhone 11 / iPhone XR offers solid protection for your device's screen at an affordable price. As an iPhone 11 user, I wanted a reliable screen protector that would shield my phone from scratches and minor impacts, and this product did not disappoint.One of the standout features of this screen protector is its ease of installation. The package includes three protectors, which is great for those inevitable mishaps during application. The instructions were clear, and the installation process was hassle-free. The protectors adhered smoothly to the screen without any noticeable bubbles or imperfections.The transparency of the screen protector is impressive, allowing for a high-definition viewing experience. I found that it did not affect the clarity or touch sensitivity of my iPhone 11's screen. The oleophobic coating effectively repelled fingerprints and smudges, keeping the screen cleaner for longer periods.Durability-wise, the AVOAR screen protector held up well in day-to-day use. It effectively guarded my phone's display against scratches from keys and accidental drops. However, it's worth noting that it may not provide the same level of protection as some tempered glass alternatives for more severe impacts.The only minor drawback I encountered was the sizing of the protector. While it perfectly fit the screen of my iPhone 11, some users reported that it was slightly smaller for iPhone XR models. So, if you have an iPhone XR, double-check the fit before applying the protector.Overall, the AVOAR 3 Pack Screen Protector for iPhone 11 / iPhone XR is a reliable choice for screen protection at an affordable price point. It offers easy installation, excellent transparency, and sufficient defense against scratches and minor impacts. Just make sure to confirm compatibility with your specific iPhone model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Quality is good, thick, better than other ones I’ve tried

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Listen, I HATE applying these screen covers to my phone. This one was the EASIEST screen protector I’ve ever used. I had to pick up and reapply 3 times but no bubbles, no lighter spots that didn’t stick. It’s PERFECT! I am marking these so when I need a new set, I’m coming back to these!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Case is secure, camera protector not so much
reviews.reviewText: Case is wonderful, wraps phone perfectly. Camera screen protector cracked immediately when dropped and did NOT protect the lens. New phone, $275 repair bill for lens….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would Buy Again
reviews.reviewText: In essence, this screen protector is a straightforward and effective solution. Its simplicity is its strength, as it effectively fulfills its primary purpose of protecting your phone's screen. There's not much complexity to discuss, but that simplicity is what makes it a reliable choice for safeguarding your device.If you're in search of a no-fuss, job-done type of screen protector that offers solid protection for your phone, this is a good fit. It provides the necessary defense without unnecessary frills or complications. In conclusion, it's a straightforward choice that gets the job done and is beneficial for your phone's screen protection.
Excelente producto de lo mejor que hay en el mercado con un costo económico
